SMARTER Act is strongly supported by @johncornyn @chuckgrassley @senmikelee @senorrinhatch @sencaptio who’ve introduced it in the Senate.
This bill requires FTC to litigate the merits of contested merger cases in federal court under the Clayton Act—just as DOJ does.
This bill requires the FTC to satisfy the same standards that DOJ must meet in order to obtain a preliminary injunction to block a merger.
The SMARTER Act prevents the FTC from using costly administrative proceedings to prevent a merger once it’s been approved in a federal court
The SMARTER Act requires the FTC and DOJ to use the same standards when blocking a merger.
My bill, the SMARTER Act, is coming to a House vote today. I encourage my colleagues to vote for this commonsense bill.
